- Add vercel.json for deployment configuration
- Remove 600+ temporary tmpclaude-* files
- ZAMA NFT Token ID: 0.0.7730446

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
